title: [BUG] Encoding/Decoding PNG image produces artifacts in the output after upgrading to SkiaSharp 2.88.0.
body:
**Description**

After encoding/decoding PNG image, the output image has artifacts. Everything works fine in 2.80.1 version of SkiaSharp.
[images.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/9099831/images.zip)

**Code**

```cs
using SkiaSharp;

using SKBitmap bmp = SKBitmap.Decode(@"C:\Temp\image1.png");
using SKFileWStream output = new SKFileWStream(@"C:\Temp\out.png");
bmp.Encode(output, SKEncodedImageFormat.Png, 100);
```

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.88.0
- Last known good version:  2.80.1
- IDE:  VS 2022
  

**Screenshots**

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31235892/178673004-07dc09f7-ce87-4d36-a0b5-c4a4138a11ce.png)
